subject: Football
lead_paragraph: No. 23 West Virginia rallied from 15 points down in the fourth quarter to force overtime, and Tyler Bitancurt’s 20-yard field goal in the first extra session lifted the Mountaineers to a 24-21 victory over Marshall.
snippet: No. 23 West Virginia rallied from 15 points down in the fourth quarter to force overtime, and Tyler Bitancurt’s 20-yard field goal in the first extra session lifted the Mountaineers to a 24-21 victory over Marshall.
